entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Burwash Landing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -35.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burwash Airport 08:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -35.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -39.5°C
Wind: WNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 33. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 33. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
